title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7900.8 - Confidential treatment of information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7900.8 - Confidential treatment of information

State Regulations

The State Energy Office may deny requests for access to
monthly reports submitted under section
7900.4
of this Part, applications
submitted under section
7901.4
of this Title, or other set-
aside system records to the extent that such records or portions thereof fall
within section
7801.7
(b)(4)
of
this Title or other exemption from disclosure provisions of the State Energy

Office's public access to records (Freedom of Information)
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7900.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
